latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Socio-economic Dynamics of Changes in Rice Production System in Uttar Pradesh-NATP

dsDescriptionValue.value: 1.) To analyze the spatial patterns of rice productivity growth in the context of broader changes taking place in agriculture. 2.) To analyze the patterns of rice technology adoption, constraints to adoption and importance of rice in rural livelihoods. 3.) To draw implications for technology design and policy reforms needed to accelerate rice productivity growth.

keywordValue.value: To draw implications for technology design and policy reforms needed to accelerate rice productivity growth.

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 200;
